snippet.title: Video/DVD Review: My Own Private Idaho
snippet.description: Delicate portrayal of street hustlers isn't meant for kids.

snippet.title: DVD Review: Bram Stoker's Dracula
snippet.description: Bloody, sexy, scary Dracula for mature teens only!

snippet.title: Video/DVD Review: Sweet November
snippet.description: So-so Love Story for a new generation.

snippet.title: Video/DVD Review: Speed
snippet.description: Explosive bus ride for mature action lovers.

snippet.title: Video/DVD Review: The Day the Earth Stood Still
snippet.description: Sci-fi remake has big effects but no real power.

snippet.title: Movie Review: Henry's Crime
snippet.description: Aside from language, so-so caper comedy is fine for teens.

snippet.title: Video/DVD Review: Bill & Ted's Excellent Adventure
snippet.description: Silly time-capsule comedy ideal for older tweens.

snippet.title: DVD Review: Hardball
snippet.description: This umpire calls Hardball out at first base.

snippet.title: Video/DVD Review: The Matrix Revolutions
snippet.description: Finale with same heavy violence, weaker script.
